document_data.mainbody:
Sultan Kara al-Zalim, also called the Fierce Sword of the Sea, was the ruler of Jumlat in the Pearl Cities region of west Zakhara in 1367 DR. 
Kara was both cunning and ruthless. These traits made him extremely popular with Jumlats wealthiest citizens.
Kara earned his reputation as a ruthless corsair during countless raids against Ganas fleet.
Kara was the nephew of Jumlats previous sultan and was chosen as the sultans successor over his own children.
